name: Caramelized Pistachio & Rosemary Brittle
description: Indulge your taste buds with our Caramelized Pistachio & Rosemary Brittle, a sophisticated twist on a classic treat. Each batch is handcrafted using premium California pistachios, gently roasted and embedded in golden, buttery caramel, then delicately infused with fresh rosemary for an aromatic finish. Perfect as a luxurious snack, elegant party favor, or creative cheese board addition. Free from artificial flavors and preservatives, this brittle delivers a balanced sweetness and savory crunch in every bite.

attributes.ingredients: Sugar, pistachios, butter, rosemary, sea salt
